command.shadowedhearts.shadow.set.descri: Set the shadow flag for a Pokémon entity.
command.shadowedhearts.shadow.corr.descr: Set the corruption meter (0–100) for a Pokémon entity.
command.shadowedhearts.shadowmission.des: Shadow Missions admin and debug commands.
cobblemon.move.shadowblast.desc: A wicked blade of air is formed using a shadowy aura.
cobblemon.move.shadowblitz.desc: A Pokémon throws this tackle while casting a shadowy aura.
cobblemon.move.shadowbolt.desc: A shadowy thunder attack that may paralyze.
cobblemon.move.shadowbreak.desc: A shattering ram attack with a shadowy aura.
cobblemon.move.shadowchill.desc: A shadowy ice attack that may freeze.
cobblemon.move.shadowdown.desc: A shadowy aura sharply cuts the foe's Defense.
cobblemon.move.shadowend.desc: A shadowy aura ram attack that also rebounds on the user.
cobblemon.move.shadowfire.desc: A shadowy fireball attack that may inflict a burn.
cobblemon.move.shadowhalf.desc: A shadowy aura's energy cuts everyone's HP by half.
cobblemon.move.shadowmist.desc: A shadowy aura sharply cuts the foe's evasiveness.
cobblemon.move.shadowpanic.desc: A shadowy aura emanates to cause a confuse condition.
cobblemon.move.shadowrave.desc: A shadowy aura in the ground is used to launch spikes.
cobblemon.move.shadowrush.desc: A Pokémon executes a tackle while exuding a shadowy aura. An attack that is so harsh, it also hurts the attacker.
cobblemon.move.shadowshed.desc: A shadowy aura eliminates Reflect and similar moves.
cobblemon.move.shadowsky.desc: Darkness hurts all but Shadow Pokémon for 5 turns.
cobblemon.move.shadowstorm.desc: A shadowy aura is used to whip up a vicious tornado.
cobblemon.move.shadowwave.desc: Shadowy aura waves are loosed to inflict damage.
cobblemon.battle.weather.shadowyaura.sta: A shadowy aura filled the sky!
cobblemon.battle.weather.shadowyaura.upk: Bursts of light showered from the shadowy aura!
cobblemon.battle.hypermode.use_shadow: %s goes into Hyper Mode and uses a Shadow move instead!
cobblemon.battle.start.hypermode: %s emotions rose to a fever pitch! It entered HYPER MODE!
cobblemon.battle.hypermode.disobey: %s won't obey and uses another move!
cobblemon.battle.hypermode.attack_ally: %s turns on its ally in Hyper Mode!
cobblemon.battle.hypermode.thrashing: %s is thrashing about in Hyper Mode!
cobblemon.battle.hypermode.fumble: %s fumbles with an item... but nothing happens.
cobblemon.battle.hypermode.lash_out: %s lashes out at its Trainer! (No effect)
cobblemon.battle.hypermode.return_ball: %s tries to return to its Poké Ball!
cobblemon.battle.hypermode.switch_fail: But it can't be switched out!
cobblemon.battle.reversemode.disobey: %s is in Reverse Mode and won't obey!
shadowedhearts.shadow.nickname_blocked: This Pokémon resists nicknames while shrouded in shadow.
subtitles.shadowedhearts.shadow_aura_loo: A shadowy aura emanates from a Pokémon
subtitles.shadowedhearts.shadow_aura_ini: A Pokémon releases a burst of shadowy aura
message.shadowedhearts.scent_cooldown: You must wait %d seconds before using another scent on this Pokémon.
message.shadowedhearts.relic_stone.not_r: Nearby Shadow Pokémon are not ready for purification yet.
message.shadowedhearts.relic_stone.coold: The Relic Stone's power is recharging. Please wait %d minutes and %d seconds.
